name: Recovery indicators
functionStatement: Long-term changes in channel size and slope maintain dynamic equilibrium and diverse habitats while interacting with the floodplain.
descriptionMarkdown: Channel shows vegetated benches/floodplain formation, indicating recovery from incision/widening.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Identify vegetated benches or inset floodplains and track their extent using imagery and elevation profiles where available.

levels.label: Optimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Broadly established benches or inset floodplains indicate strong recovery.

levels.label: Suboptimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Noticeable but incomplete bench or bar formation.

levels.label: Marginal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Sparse new floodplain surfaces with ongoing erosion.

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: No meaningful recovery indicators and continued instability.

references: USGS 3DEP LiDAR cross sections and elevation profiles
NAIP or orthophotos for benches and bars.
